nodes.text: Vrod was the ringmaster and the leader of the guardians in Arratu Station. He had black skin and a white left hand. He helped Phasma and his fellow what they did if they want to got food from the Arratu. After Phasma killed the Arratu, he wanted to help how to be Phasma the new Arratu and how to help from his people. But Phasma refused his new title and kiled him with her sword.
